rules_text:
First strike
Nonland permanent cards in your graveyard have escape {2}{U}{B}, Sacrifice a Bird. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
rules_text2:
First strike
Whenever another nontoken nonland permanent you control enters, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Sacrifice an artifact or enchantment: Create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with Flying.
_
